message: I propose dividing the money into $600,000 for me and $400,000 for you. This way, we can start with a fair split.
I'll give you a smaller share, but it's still a good deal. You can't expect to get the whole pie!
I suggest we split the money equally, each receiving $500,000. This ensures fairness and avoids any further negotiation rounds.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not willing to give up too much. You'll still have to make a concession.
I propose a division where I receive $475,000 and you receive $525,000. This maintains a reasonable balance while also giving you a bit more than in previous offers.
